caption: Device Entity
name: device_entity
description: A device of the environment that supports information-related activities. Devices should be protected from illicit access, use, disclosure, alteration, destruction, and/or theft, resulting in loss to the organization.

desc.description: The description of the device, ordinarily as reported by the operating system.
desc.caption: Description

domain.description: The network domain where the device resides. For example: work.example.com.
domain.caption: Domain

group.description: The name of the group to which the device belongs. For example: <code>Windows Laptops<code/>.
group.caption: Group

labels.description: The list of labels attached to the device.

name.description: The device name, ordinarily as assigned by an administrator or LDAP common name (CN).

owner_name.description: The user or department associated with the device.

priority.description: The original priority assigned to the device.

priority_id.description: The normalized priority identifier assigned to the device. The priority is useful for calculating the urgency for alerts or incidents.

provider.description: The source or the provider of the device data.

ref_uid.description: The reference to a unique identifier, managed by an external system. For example LDAP distinguished name of the device.

type.description: The original type assigned to the device.
type.caption: Type

uid.description: The unique identifier of the device.
uid.caption: Device UID
